mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS stock_buy_queue ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `stock_num` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '股票编码', `detail` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '盘口详情', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `idx_stock_num` (`stock_num`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;
